name: Melody Mania
description:
Enjoy a fun singing party!

Sing along your favorite songs and try to hit notes for points, alone, in a duet, or with friends.
Feel like a superstar while you break the highscore!
Invite your family and friends to rock the virtual stage together!

Songs

Add your own songs in the community grown UltraStar format, or the industry proven MIDI format.

The integrated editor and AI tools let you create a sing-along version of any song you like, so you'll never run out of options.

Note however that no songs are included by default, except for a handful of songs with a Creative Commons license to demonstrate gameplay.

Feature Highlights

  • Score Modes - Challenge your friends or sing cooperatively. As alternative, turn off all ratings to enjoy old school karaoke without competition.
  • Duet Songs - Sing a duet where both players have different lyrics and notes.
  • Team & Tournament - Play multiple rounds or start a knock-out tournament.
  • Pass the Mic - Switch players in the middle of a song. Fun for groups of all sizes!
  • Song Queue - Play multiple songs from the queue without interruption.
  • Medleys - Play a shortened mix of songs in the queue.
  • Mute Vocals - Silence the vocals of any song to enjoy a classic karaoke experience, thanks to AI powered vocals isolation.
  • Playlists - Mark songs as favorites and organize your song library with playlists in M3U or UltraStar format.
  • Webcam - Use your camera as background video or take a snapshot for your profile image
  • Embedded Browser - Play with videos on the internet (e.g. YouTube) as alternative to local audio and video files.

Song Editor

Create a sing-along version of any song.

  • Isolate vocals, apply speech recognition and pitch detection via AI
  • Add notes via button tapping or by dictating lyrics
  • Edit notes via drag & drop
  • Add videos and images
  • Import MIDI files
  • Quickly switch between editing and singing

Companion App

The free Melody Mania Companion App for Android provides additional goodies for the game.

  • Use your smartphone as mic. No need to buy new equipment!
  • Search and enqueue songs while others are still playing. No need to interrupt the game flow!
  • Navigate the game remotely. No need to hang around your keyboard!

Customizable

Melody Mania was designed to be customizable and extensible. You can not only add your own songs but also your own images and themes.

Enjoy Yourself

Don't be afraid, just sing with passion and let the pitch detection guide your voice.
Start now with Melody Mania, soften your lips and let's sing it at the top of our lungs!
This revolution of karaoke never gets old.

Have fun with Melody Mania!

Supported File Formats

  • Audio files: aac, aiff, flac, m4a, mp3, ogg (recommended), wav, wma
  • Video files: avi, f4v, flv, mkv, mov, mp4, mpg, webm (webm with VP8 recommended), wmv
  • Image files: png, jpg
  • Karaoke files: UltraStar txt (recommended), MIDI with lyrics

Experimental Features

  • Play back mic input to hear yourself over the speakers
